Class User

java.lang.Object
users.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Student, Teacher
public class User extends Object
The User class is a class that represents a user. This class maintains values that are essential to a user: name, username, password, school affiliation, ID, and a list of classes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, String username, String password, School school)
      Constructs a User with first name, last name, username, password, school, and a randomly assigned ID.
      Parameters:
      firstName - user's first name
      lastName - user's last name
      username - user's username
      password - user's password
      school - user's school affiliation

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, String username, String password, School school, int id)
      Constructs a User with first name, last name, username, password, school, and an ID. Meant to be for users collected from the database.
      Parameters:
      firstName - user's first name
      lastName - user's last name
      username - user's username
      password - user's password
      school - user's school affiliation
      id - user's id

      public boolean isStudent()
